languages.text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} deal an additional +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. If the wearer was attacked with an attack of opportunity, the attacker also suffers toxic {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.
languages.original_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж наносит +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} дополнительно. Если атаку по возможности совершают против персонажа, атакующий тоже получает токсичный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wielder's attacks of opportunity deals an additional +10 toxic damage. If the wielder was attacked with an attack of opportunity, the attacker also suffers toxic damage. Base armour property: +15 armour against ranged attacks.

languages.text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}可额外造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。当装备者遭到借机攻击时，攻击者也同样会受到毒素{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 基础护甲特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}时，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}可额外造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。当装备者遭到借机攻击时，攻击者也同样会受到毒素伤害。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，获得+15%护甲。

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent +10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} supplémentaires. Si l'utilisateur a été la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité, l'attaquant subit également des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} toxiques. Propriété d'armure de base: +15  d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}.

Si l'utilisateur a été la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité, l'attaquant subit également des dégâts toxiques. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15 d'armure contre les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} des Trägers verursachen zusätzlich +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Wurde der Träger mit einem Gelegenheitsangriff attackiert, erleidet der Angreifer ebenfalls {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Giftschaden{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} des Trägers fügen zusätzlich +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Sollte der Träger mit einem Gelegenheitsangriff attackiert worden sein, erleidet der Angreifer ebenfalls Giftschaden. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15 Rüstung gegen{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}が+10増加する。使用者が機会攻撃で攻撃された場合、攻撃者も毒の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けることとなる。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離攻撃{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+15。

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırıları{/g}, ilave +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} verir. Giyen kişi, fırsat saldırısına uğradığında saldırgan da ayrıca toksik {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır. Taban zırh özelliği: {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Menzilli saldırılara{/g} karşı +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.
